metadata.dc:author: Lavilla, L
Cristóbal, J A
Mateo, A J
Mateo, J
Recio, C
metadata.dc:description: CASE REPORT An 85 year old male suffered vision loss in both eyes due to ruptured bilateral retinal arterial macroaneurysms. DISCUSSION We report this unusual case and show the importance of studying these types of patients in order to detect associated systemic diseases.
metadata.dc:title: Diagnóstico de patología sistémica tras macroaneurisma arterial retiniano bilateral.
[Diagnosis of systemic disease after bilateral retinal arterial macroaneurysm].
metadata.dc:publisher: Archivos de la Sociedad Espanola de Oftalmologia
